description: Verify that the Manager Export file (TO_MGR_APPLY) includes the 'account_id' field to satisfy the Look-through requirement, correcting the previous missing header definition.
source_rule_logic: The Manager Export file (generated by TradeProcessor) must include the 'account_id' field to satisfy the 'Look-through' requirement. The current implementation explicitly defines headers as only 'trans_id', 'fund_code', 'type', 'amount', 'shares', 'apply_time', missing the critical investor account identifier.
